name: Time Bomb (PDI)
overview: Time Bomb is a 1-player word game for the 8-bit Atari. The player most solve a word before a stick of dynamite explodes. The player takes turns guessing letters to fill in a number of blanks, and each guess shortens the explosive's fuse. After each letter, the player has a chance to solve the puzzle. The player can also add their own words to solve.
